meanings.definition: ルツアミアン（未確認の言語/民族名）
meanings.english_definition: Unidentified term - possibly referring to an obscure language/ethnic group
meanings.notes: This term doesn't appear in standard dictionaries. It may be: 1) A misspelling of 'Lithuanian' 2) A fictional/conlang term 3) An extremely obscure regional reference

examples.translation: ルツアミアンの写本は未解読のままである

usage_notes.warning: ⚠️ This term lacks verified linguistic/cultural references. If referring to Lithuania or Lithuanian, correct to 'Lithuanian' (リトアニア/リトアニア語)

common_mistakes.note: Confirmed language name when referring to Lithuania
